name: Marcin Karol Kotlinski
profile_summary:
As a Senior Backend Engineer with 8 years of full-stack experience, I excel in crafting high-performance APIs and backend solutions utilizing **Ruby**, **Go**, and **TypeScript**. My proficiency in backend development is complemented by my ability to implement robust observability measures and ensure software quality. I bring a strong problem-solving mindset and a sense of ownership in all projects I undertake. 
My technical expertise also includes modern frameworks like **React**, **Next.js**, **Vue**, and **Node.js**, alongside comprehensive cloud experience with **Azure** and **AWS**. I have successfully led the development of enterprise-grade platforms, incorporating AI/ML capabilities for predictive analytics and real-time data processing. I am well-versed in microservices architecture and CI/CD automation, ensuring compliance with industry standards such as HIPAA, FHIR, PCI DSS, and SOC 2. Additionally, I possess hands-on experience in developing machine learning pipelines and implementing MLOps workflows with tools like **MLflow**, **Airflow**, and **Kubeflow**.
